title: TPG RE Finance Trust Inc Stock Splits & Corporate Actions

content.text: TPG RE Finance Trust Inc (TRTX) completes its initial public offering on July 18, 2017.
On September 20, 2019, TPG RE Finance Trust Inc declares a dividend distribution of $0.43 per share.
TRTX declares a dividend distribution of $0.20 per share on January 15, 2020.
TPG RE Finance Trust Inc announces a 1-for-3 reverse stock split on May 19, 2021. The split becomes effective on June 25, 2021.
On February 17, 2022, TRTX declares a dividend distribution of $0.20 per share.
TRTX declares a dividend distribution of $0.20 per share on June 8, 2023.
On March 20, 2024, TPG RE Finance Trust Inc announces a 1-for-5 reverse stock split. The split is effective on May 8, 2024.
TRTX declares a dividend distribution of $0.22 per share on January 10, 2025.
